rules.name: catSpawnChance
rules.description: Sets chance cat will spawn in a village
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

rules.name: commandToggleSpectator
rules.description: Enables /ts command to toggle spectator mode
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: noPiglinGuarding
rules.description: Stops Piglins angering when a block they guard is interacted with or broken

rules.name: returnSpectators
rules.description: Prevent players from teleporting when using spectator mode by returning them to their previous survival position

rules.name: sharedVillagerDiscounts
rules.description: Major positive reputation is shared amongst all players

rules.name: shulkerBulletsSpawnShulkers
rules.description: Adds shulker spawning from the Caves & Cliffs 1.17 update

rules.name: visibleSpectators
rules.description: Makes spectators visible to non-spectator players
